eapli.ecafeteria.application.reporting.dishes

Class DishReportingController

  • java.lang.Object
    • eapli.ecafeteria.application.reporting.dishes.DishReportingController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    eapli.framework.application.Controller

    public class DishReportingController
extends Object
implements eapli.framework.application.Controller
    reporting is a separate concern from business logic, as such we are placing reporting features in a separate package structure.
    Author:
    pgsou_000

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DishReportingController() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Iterable<DishesPerCaloricCategory> reportDishesPerCaloricCategory()
      reports the number of dishes per caloric group (low, medium, high) in this case we are using a custom DTO
      Iterable<Object[]> reportDishesPerCaloricCategoryAsTuples()
      reports the number of dishes per caloric group (low, medium, high) in this case we are returning the data as standard tuples (arrays of objects)
      Iterable<DishesPerDishType> reportDishesPerDishType()
      reports the number of dishes per dish type in this case we are using a custom reporting DTO
      Iterable<Dish> reportHighCaloriesDishes()
      reports the dishes that have a high calorie count "high calorie" is defined in the application properties
